com.tsgrp.migration.util

Class RosettaExcel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tsgrp.migration.util.RosettaExcel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rosetta
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RosettaCSV

    public class RosettaExcel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rosetta
    Rosetta class which translates strings stored in an Excel or CSV file. Properly formatted files should contain the old strings in the 1st column and the corresponding new strings in the 2nd column. Optional header rows can be included but the number of rows must be injected to ensure proper translation.

    Modification History

    • Mar 24, 2010 (Todd Pierzina) Trim key and values during init
    Copyright (C) 2010 Technology Services Group, Inc.

      • setFile

        public void setFile(java.lang.String value)
        Injected, REQUIRED. File path to Excel or CSV file which contains translations

      • setSheetName

        public void setSheetName(java.lang.String value)
        Injected, Optional. Name of sheet in Excel file which contains translations. If not set, first sheet will be used

      • setHeaderRows

        public void setHeaderRows(int value)
        Injected, OPTIONAL. Number of header rows to be ignored at the top of the id file; defaults to 0
